17#include "ODITFWriter.h"
18#include "ODWriterHelper.h"
19
20#include <array>
21#include <stdexcept>
22#include <vector>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25namespace OneD {
26
27static const std::array<int, 4> START_PATTERN = { 1, 1, 1, 1 };
28static const std::array<int, 3> END_PATTERN = { 3, 1, 1 };
29
30static const int W = 3; // Pixel width of a wide line
31static const int N = 1; // Pixed width of a narrow line
32
33/**
34* Patterns of Wide / Narrow lines to indicate each digit
35*/
36static const std::array<std::array<int, 5>, 10> PATTERNS = {
37 N, N, W, W, N, // 0
38 W, N, N, N, W, // 1
39 N, W, N, N, W, // 2
40 W, W, N, N, N, // 3
41 N, N, W, N, W, // 4
42 W, N, W, N, N, // 5
43 N, W, W, N, N, // 6
44 N, N, N, W, W, // 7
45 W, N, N, W, N, // 8
46 N, W, N, W, N, // 9
47};
48
49BitMatrix
50ITFWriter::encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const
51{
52 size_t length = contents.length();
53 if (length == 0) {
54 throw std::invalid_argument("Found empty contents");
55 }
56 if (length % 2 != 0) {
57 throw std::invalid_argument("The length of the input should be even");
58 }
59 if (length > 80) {
60 throw std::invalid_argument("Requested contents should be less than 80 digits long");
61 }
62
63 std::vector<bool> result(9 + 9 * length, false);
64 int pos = WriterHelper::AppendPattern(result, 0, START_PATTERN, true);
65 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i += 2) {
66 int one = contents[i] - '0';
67 int two = contents[i + 1] - '0';
68 if (one < 0 || one > 9 || two < 0 || two > 9) {
69 throw std::invalid_argument("Contents should contain only digits: 0-9");
70 }
71 std::array<int, 10> encoding = {};
72 for (int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
73 encoding[2 * j] = PATTERNS[one][j];
74 encoding[2 * j + 1] = PATTERNS[two][j];
75 }
76 pos += WriterHelper::AppendPattern(result, pos, encoding, true);
77 }
78 WriterHelper::AppendPattern(result, pos, END_PATTERN, true);
79 return WriterHelper::RenderResult(result, width, height, _sidesMargin >= 0 ? _sidesMargin : 10);
80}
81
82} // OneD
83} // ZXing
84
